summary: Defines a variational network model that reconstructs accelerated MRI data by jointly learning coil sensitivity maps and applying a cascade of convolutional refinements interleaved with data‑consistency steps, converting undersampled k‑space measurements into high‑quality images.
business_intent: Enable faster, cost‑effective MRI examinations by providing a deep‑learning‑based reconstruction tool that delivers diagnostic‑quality images from reduced acquisition data, supporting clinical workflows and research into accelerated imaging protocols.
